messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] who is coming to the conference
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/10/2003 10:17:49 AM Eastern Daylight Time, ... Monica, you re in luck---we re in your back yard! Columbia, SC August 22-24 Early Bird
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/10/2003 10:17:49 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:


> I'm a new member to the list and to "unschooling"
> (we'll wrap-up traditional classroom method in June,
> take a break, and start living with unschooling for
> life [or until God directs us differently] this fall.)
>
> Anywho, could you please post more info on the
> conference, such as dates, location, and/or website?
>
> Thank you,
> Monica
> (Mom of Christian 10 yrs, Chloe 15 mos)
> Wake Forest, NC
>

Monica, you're in luck---we're in your back yard!

Columbia, SC
August 22-24
Early Bird Registration (big price break!) ends June 1---get it in soon!

http://www.schoolsoutsupport.org/events

Hope to see you then!

~Kelly

Kelly Lovejoy, Coordinator
Schools Out Support
mailto:coordinator@...
803-776-4849
Fax: 803-776-7006
http://www.schoolsoutsupport.org
